channel.title: Cowie`
channel.description: Cowie` should not be aloud any kinda of power in anyway shape or form he abuses it on the IRC coz he thinks he's white and bans people for no reason in all honesty he should be banned

@Tico135 wrote:

The internet is serious business.

But seriously, I’ve been kbed from #mopar a few times, not to mention it was always by frank_ but I usually just wait like 2 minutes and he’ll unban me. It’s not a big deal, after all, it should be more of a lesson (KNOW WHEN TO SHUT THE FUCK UP).

[/quote]

no you lasted that long because you have the power to !kb etc so of course your still gonna be there

Oh and err, i’ve only had op since january, even still if we was being cunts our power would of been removed by someone with higher status in the channel, ie: stork, Lothy, Niall or Greeny.[/quote]

item.title: Cowie`
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:12, topic:210813”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=277723.msg2263475#msg2263475 date=1212882056]
Uhh, on #mopar people usually get banned for being annoying twats.
[/quote]
yet you and cowie` are still there interesting isn’t it?

Ahh how i’ve missed these ‘irc abuse’ topics.

your his bitch sdfu and your just as bad
Frostie he just abuses power not about what he says tbh i couldn’t care less about what he says its just he abuses the power he has been trusted with

So;

You come to #mopar and act a total faggot, then when you get told, “sdfu homo” you cry and whine, then when someone once more tells you to shut the fuck up all that happens is you shout and scream louder and louder until there is no other option but to !mute or !kb.

If you didn’t have that power you wouldn’t say a single bad word because you would be b&[/quote]

Oh, back before I got power I was a regular addition to the banlist and a thorn in ViciousPotato’s /akill fingers.

Read full topic
